languages.text: "Почему тебя сопровождает дитя теней?" {n}Обратив взор на Маражая, эльдар мрачнеет еще больше.{/n} "Глубоко в его сердце я вижу пустившие корни мрак и отчаяние. Они погубят его душу, мон-кай. А его неутолимая жажда крови погубит тебя. Конечно, если ты окажешься достаточно глуп, чтобы позволить ей захлестнуть и тебя".

traits.locale_text: "Почему тебя сопровождает дитя теней?" {n}Обратив взор на Маражая, эльдар мрачнеет еще больше.{/n} "Глубоко в его сердце я вижу пустившие корни мрак и отчаяние. Они погубят его душу, мон-кай. А его неутолимая жажда крови погубит тебя. Конечно, если ты окажешься достаточно глуп, чтобы позволить ей захлестнуть и тебя".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Why does a child of the shadows accompany you?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes turn to Marazhai and darken even more.{/n} "In his heart, I see deep-rooted gloom and despair. They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."
languages.original_text: "Почему тебя сопровождает дитя теней?" {n}Обратив взор на Маражая, эльдар мрачнеет еще больше.{/n} "Глубоко в его сердце я вижу пустившие корни мрак и отчаяние. Они погубят его душу, мон-кай. А его неутолимая жажда крови погубит тебя. Конечно, если ты окажешься достаточно глуп, чтобы позволить ей захлестнуть и тебя".

They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."

They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."

They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

traits.locale_text: "Why does a child of the shadows accompany you?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes turn to Marazhai and darken even more.{/n} "In his heart, I see deep-rooted gloom and despair. They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: «¿Por qué te acompaña un hijo de las sombras?». {n}El Aeldari mira a Marazhai y su expresión se ensombrece aún más.{/n} «Veo la oscuridad y la desesperación arraigadas en su corazón. Destruirán su alma, mon-keigh. Y su insaciable sed de sangre será tu perdición. Suponiendo, claro está, que seas lo bastante {mf|estúpido|estúpida} para dejar que se apoderen de ti también».
languages.original_text: "Why does a child of the shadows accompany you?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes turn to Marazhai and darken even more.{/n} "In his heart, I see deep-rooted gloom and despair. They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."

traits.locale_text: «¿Por qué te acompaña un hijo de las sombras?». {n}El Aeldari mira a Marazhai y su expresión se ensombrece aún más.{/n} «Veo la oscuridad y la desesperación arraigadas en su corazón. Destruirán su alma, mon-keigh. Y su insaciable sed de sangre será tu perdición. Suponiendo, claro está, que seas lo bastante {mf|estúpido|estúpida} para dejar que se apoderen de ti también».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: 「なぜ影の子が同行する？」{n}暗みが増したアエルダリの目がマラズハイに向けられる。{/n} 「あの者の心には根深い闇と絶望が私に見える。それはあの者の魂を破壊するものだぞ、モン＝ケイ。そして、あの者の血への飽くなき渇望はお前を滅ぼすだろう。無論、その渇望に支配されることを許すほどお前が愚かであればの話だがな」
languages.original_text: "Why does a child of the shadows accompany you?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes turn to Marazhai and darken even more.{/n} "In his heart, I see deep-rooted gloom and despair. They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."

traits.locale_text: 「なぜ影の子が同行する？」{n}暗みが増したアエルダリの目がマラズハイに向けられる。{/n} 「あの者の心には根深い闇と絶望が私に見える。それはあの者の魂を破壊するものだぞ、モン＝ケイ。そして、あの者の血への飽くなき渇望はお前を滅ぼすだろう。無論、その渇望に支配されることを許すほどお前が愚かであればの話だがな」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: “阴影的子嗣为什么跟在你身边？”{n}艾达灵族望向玛拉斋，眼神变得更加阴沉。{/n}“我在他心中看到了根深蒂固的阴沉与绝望。它们会摧毁他的灵魂，猴子，他对鲜血的无尽贪婪也会摧毁你。当然，假如你真的愚蠢到放任他肆意妄为。”
languages.original_text: "Why does a child of the shadows accompany you?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes turn to Marazhai and darken even more.{/n} "In his heart, I see deep-rooted gloom and despair. They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."

traits.locale_text: “阴影的子嗣为什么跟在你身边？”{n}艾达灵族望向玛拉斋，眼神变得更加阴沉。{/n}“我在他心中看到了根深蒂固的阴沉与绝望。它们会摧毁他的灵魂，猴子，他对鲜血的无尽贪婪也会摧毁你。当然，假如你真的愚蠢到放任他肆意妄为。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: « Pourquoi cet enfant de l'ombre vous accompagne-t-i ? » {n}Le regard de l'Aeldari se tourne vers Marazhai et s'assombrit encore davantage.{/n} « Dans son cœur, je vois une tristesse et un désespoir profondément ancrés. Ils détruiront son âme, mon-keigh. Et son insatiable soif de sang sonnera votre glas. Uniquement, bien sûr, si vous êtes assez stupide pour la laisser vous submerger également. »
languages.original_text: "Why does a child of the shadows accompany you?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes turn to Marazhai and darken even more.{/n} "In his heart, I see deep-rooted gloom and despair. They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."

traits.locale_text: « Pourquoi cet enfant de l'ombre vous accompagne-t-i ? » {n}Le regard de l'Aeldari se tourne vers Marazhai et s'assombrit encore davantage.{/n} « Dans son cœur, je vois une tristesse et un désespoir profondément ancrés. Ils détruiront son âme, mon-keigh. Et son insatiable soif de sang sonnera votre glas. Uniquement, bien sûr, si vous êtes assez stupide pour la laisser vous submerger également. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Warum werdet Ihr von einem Kind der Schatten begleitet?" {n}Die Augen des Aeldari richten sich auf Marazhai und verdunkeln sich weiter.{/n} "Ich erkenne in seinem Herzen tief verwurzelte Finertnis und noch größeren Wahnsinn. Sie werden seine Seele zerstören, Chem-Pan-Sey. Und seine unstillbare Gier nach Blut wird Euch vernichten. Natürlich nur, wenn Ihr töricht genug seid, Euch auch von ihr vereinnahmen zu lassen."
languages.original_text: "Why does a child of the shadows accompany you?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes turn to Marazhai and darken even more.{/n} "In his heart, I see deep-rooted gloom and despair. They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."

traits.locale_text: "Warum werdet Ihr von einem Kind der Schatten begleitet?" {n}Die Augen des Aeldari richten sich auf Marazhai und verdunkeln sich weiter.{/n} "Ich erkenne in seinem Herzen tief verwurzelte Finertnis und noch größeren Wahnsinn. Sie werden seine Seele zerstören, Chem-Pan-Sey. Und seine unstillbare Gier nach Blut wird Euch vernichten. Natürlich nur, wenn Ihr töricht genug seid, Euch auch von ihr vereinnahmen zu lassen."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: "Neden gölgelerin çocuğu sana eşlik ediyor?" {n}Aeldari'nin Marazhai'a çevirdiği gözlerinde daha karanlık bir bakış beliriyor.{/n} "Yüreğinin derinlerinde kasvet ve çaresizliğin kök saldığını görüyorum. Bunlar onun ruhunu yok edecek mon-keigh. Doymak bilmeyen kana susamışlığı da seni yok edecek. Ahmak olma, seni ağına düşürmesine izin verme."
languages.original_text: "Why does a child of the shadows accompany you?" {n}The Aeldari's eyes turn to Marazhai and darken even more.{/n} "In his heart, I see deep-rooted gloom and despair. They will destroy his soul, mon-keigh. And his insatiable thirst for blood will destroy you. That is, of course, if you are stupid enough to allow it to overtake you as well."

traits.locale_text: "Neden gölgelerin bir çocuğu sana eşlik ediyor?" {n}Aeldari'nin Marazhai'a çevirdiği gözlerinde daha karanlık bir bakış beliriyor.{/n} "Onun yüreğinin derinlerinde kasvet ve çaresizliğin kök saldığını görüyorum. Bunlar onun ruhunu yok edecek mon-keigh. Doymak bilmeyen kana susamışlığı ise seni yok edecek. Tabii ki seni ağına düşürmesine izin verecek kadar ahmaksan..."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
